title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 290: Featuring Ryan Reaves + Mike Commodore
description:
On Monday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Ryan Reaves and Mike Commodore. Reavo joined (06:12) to talk about the NHL’s postponement of games and the entire process of what went on behind the scenes. The guys then give a playoff update, recap their weekend in Boston, talk some OnlyFans drama then are joined by Mike Commodore who is fresh off a hole in one. Commie joined (52:58) to talk about his hole in one, Calgary, Edmonton and a bunch more. The guys wrap up with some golf talk and they discover RA’s hidden talent.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
